text: Hi, I need to cancel my account but there is no info on the website on how to do this. This is very frustrating so can you please just cancel my account now?
I would like to change the shipping address to another address. Can you do this for me?

After the check out process, I received a mail saying that my order had been processed and would be shipped out that day. I received a few emails with shipping and tracking numbers. I was surprised to see that the tracking said that it was shipped three days ago. I have waited nearly two weeks and it still hasn't shown up. I have called customer service many times and have not been able to get any information as to where my order is and why it was not shipped on time.

As I am sure you are aware, we are a major retailer of your products. You know that we never increase prices on our customers. We also work hard to ensure that our company is financially sound. If you check your statement, you will find that there is an amount that you owe us. This
